templateInfo.name: Hotel Website Template
templateInfo.description: A comprehensive hotel website template with configurable content sections
templateInfo.author: Template Generator

site.description: Global site configuration including SEO metadata, branding, and accessibility settings

navigation.description: Website navigation structure and menu items

hero.description: Homepage hero section with main messaging and call-to-action

rooms.description: Hotel room types, descriptions, amenities, and pricing

amenities.description: Hotel facilities and services offered to guests

location.description: Hotel location information and nearby attractions

gallery.description: Image gallery with categorized photos of the hotel

benefits.description: Key selling points and unique features of the hotel

pages.description: Individual page content including meta information

configurationGuide.overview: This template uses a configuration-driven approach where content is stored in JSON files and loaded dynamically by components.

steps.title: Update Site Information

steps.title: Configure Navigation
steps.description: Update navigation structure and menu items in extracted-content/navigation-content.json

steps.title: Customize Hero Section
steps.description: Update the homepage hero content including headlines, images, and call-to-action buttons

steps.title: Add Room Information
steps.description: Configure room types, descriptions, amenities, and pricing information

steps.title: Update Amenities
steps.description: Modify hotel facilities and services information

steps.title: Configure Location
steps.description: Update location details and nearby attractions

steps.title: Upload Gallery Images
steps.description: Replace images in public/Fantasea_Condo_Images/ and update gallery configuration

steps.title: Highlight Benefits
steps.description: Configure key selling points and unique features

steps.title: Update Page Content
steps.description: Modify individual page content and meta information

configurationSystem.description: Centralized configuration loading system with TypeScript types

components.description: React components that consume configuration data

customizationInstructions.branding: Update colors, fonts, and logos in the site configuration and Tailwind CSS classes
customizationInstructions.content: Modify JSON files in extracted-content/ directory to update all website content
customizationInstructions.images: Replace images in public/ directory and update corresponding configuration files
customizationInstructions.styling: Customize appearance using Tailwind CSS classes in component files
customizationInstructions.functionality: Extend features by modifying React components and adding new configuration sections
